H0.text: What was the name of the island where Nelson Mandela was imprisoned for 18 years. Alcatraz Island

H1.text: What was the name of the island where Nelson Mandela was imprisoned for 18 years. Isle of Wight

H2.text: What was the name of the island where Nelson Mandela was imprisoned for 18 years. Java Island

H3.text: What was the name of the island where Nelson Mandela was imprisoned for 18 years. Robbeneiland

A4.text: Nelson Mandela was imprisoned on the island for 18 of the 27 years of his imprisonment before the fall of apartheid.
